code: @Override public void start(BundleContext context) throws Exception {     // get the reference of SessionFactory service     reference = context.getServiceReference(SessionFactory.class.getName()).     SessionFactory sessionFactory = (SessionFactory) context.getService(reference).     SessionFactoryLocator.setSessionFactory(sessionFactory). }
@Override public void stop(BundleContext context) throws Exception {     // release the reference     if (reference != null) {         context.ungetService(reference).     } }
